long_description: This high-tech, rectangular sleep sack or sleeping bag liner is made of CoolMax(R) polyester for fast-drying, breathable and easy-care comfort. CoolMax polyester's four-channel fibers move sweat away from your body. If used as a liner it adds approximately 8.4deg F to the temperature rating of your sleeping bag. Features a pocket for a pillow insert. No side opening or zipper saves weight and offers the best performance. Perfect for use in youth hostels, boats, planes, trains or as a warm-weather sleeping bag. Comes with ripstop nylon stuff sack. Machine wash in cool water; tumble dry low.
short_description: This high-tech, rectangular sleep sack or sleeping bag liner is made of CoolMax(R) polyester for fast-drying, breathable and easy-care comfort.
